name: gmd:MD_Metadata
desc: Root entity that defines information about metadata.

children.name: gmd:fileIndentifier
children.desc: A unique phrase or string which uniquely identifies the metadata file.

children.name: gmd:language
children.desc: Language of the metadata composed of an ISO639-2/T three-letter language code and an ISO3166-1 three-letter country code.

children.name: gmd:parentIdentifier
children.desc: The unique name of the file or associated fileIdentifier, related in higher hierarchy to the file.

children.name: gmd:hierarchyLevel
children.desc: Level to which the metadata applies.

children.name: gmd:hierarchyLevelName
children.desc: Name of the hierarchy levels for which the metadata is provided.

children.name: gmd:contact
children.desc: The responsible party for the metadata content.

children.name: gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty
children.desc: The responsible party for the metadata content.
children.multi: The identification of those responsible for the resource and the partyâ€™s role in the resource.

children.name: gmd:organisationName
children.desc: Name of the responsible organisation.

children.name: gmd:contactInfo
children.desc: Information required enabling contact with the responsible person and/or organisation.

children.name: gmd:CI_Contact
children.desc: Information which assists one to contact an individual or organisation.

children.name: gmd:address
children.desc: Physical and email address to contact the organisation or individual.

children.name: gmd:CI_Address
children.desc: Physical and email address at which the organisation or individual may be contacted.

children.name: gmd:deliveryPoint
children.desc: Address line for the location.

children.name: gmd:city
children.desc: City of the address.

children.name: gmd:administrativeArea
children.desc: State or province of the address.

children.name: gmd:postalCode
children.desc: Administrative spatial code which assists mail and parcel delivery.

children.name: gmd:country
children.desc: Country of the physical address.

children.name: gmd:electronicMailAddress
children.desc: The electronic mailbox address of the responsible organisation or individual.

children.name: gmd:role
children.desc: Function performed by the responsible party.

children.name: gmd:CI_RoleCode
children.desc: Function performed by the responsible party.

children.name: gmd:dateStamp
children.desc: Metadata creation date.

children.name: gmd:metadataStandardName
children.desc: Name of the metadata standard/profile used.

children.name: gmd:metadataStandardVersion
children.desc: Version of the metadata standard/profile used.

children.name: gmd:referenceSystemInfo
children.desc: Identification of the spatial and temporal reference systems used.

children.desc: Describes the attributes that provide information about reference system information.

children.name: gmd:referenceSystemIdentifier
children.desc: Identifier of the Reference System.

children.desc: Identifier/namespace of the system in which the code is valid.

children.name: gmd:date
children.desc: Reference date for the cited resource; reference date and event used to describe it.

children.desc: Commonly used words or phrases which describe the dataset. Optionally, the keyword type and a citation for the authoritative or registered resource of the keywords are also provided.
